Detailed Description

StillCamera device for accessing hardware cameras

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* StillCamera::CbCaptureFinished)(INT result, void *context, UINT16 frame)
 

Callback, where application will be informed when the multi shot sequence has finished.

Parameters:
result return result
context context pointer
frame captured frame number

typedef void(* StillCamera::CbImageCaptured)(INT result, void *context, UINT16 frame)
 

Callback, where application will be informed when a snapshot has been taken. Application e.g. may play a shutter sound.

Parameters:
result return result
context context pointer
frame captured frame number

typedef void(* StillCamera::CbImageEncoded)(INT result, void *context, UINT16 frame)
 

Callback, where application will be informed when the snapshot is ready for saving, e.g. if finally has been encoded into JPEG.

Parameters:
result return result
context context pointer
frame captured frame number

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN StillCamera::CancelCapture (   ) 
 

Cancels the capturing of snapshot(s) and aborts possible JPEG encoding.

Returns:
returns FALSE if something went wrong

BOOLEAN StillCamera::Capture (  DataSink **  sink_array,
UINT16  count,
void *  context,
CbImageCaptured  cb_image_captured,
CbImageEncoded  cb_image_encoded,
CbCaptureFinished  cb_capture_finished
) 
 

Captures a count given number of images in the given sink_array.

Parameters:
sink_array DataSink (mostly RamDataSink), given by application, where encoded JPEG images are written into.
count number of images that should be captured.
context application context pointer.
cb_image_captured Application callback, when image is captured, e.g. for playing a shutter sound
cb_image_encoded Application callback, when a certain Image has finished encoding, e.g. for displaying image.
cb_capture_finished Application callback, when capturing and encoding has completed.

virtual BOOLEAN StillCamera::Close (   )  [virtual]
 

Close() frees any allocated buffers for capturing and unlocks the camera.

Returns:
returns FALSE if unlocking or buffer deallocation fails.

Reimplemented from Camera.

BOOLEAN StillCamera::ConfigureMultiShot (  UINT16  no_of_pictures,
UINT8  frame_rate_subsampling
) 
 

Buffer allocation is done for multi-shot. Buffers will be deallocated in Close() or in SetImageSize or ConfigureMultiShot again.

Parameters:
no_of_pictures how many frames should be captured
frame_rate_subsampling every "frame_rate_subsampling" frame should be captured e.g. every 5th frame
Returns:
returns TRUE is configuration for MultiShot is valid.

virtual BOOLEAN StillCamera::Open (   )  [virtual]
 

Open() sets default values for the Camera which are available through a CameraConfig or by driver. Furthermore it tries to Lock the Camera for exclusive usage.

Returns:
returns FALSE, if setting values or locking failed.

Reimplemented from Camera.

BOOLEAN StillCamera::Open (   )  [virtual]
 

Open() sets default values for the Camera which are available through a CameraConfig or by driver. Furthermore it tries to Lock the Camera for exclusive usage.

Returns:
returns FALSE, if setting values or locking failed.

Reimplemented from Camera.

BOOLEAN StillCamera::SetJpegQuality (  INT  level  ) 
 

Sets the compression level for the JPEG encoding.

Parameters:
level compression between 0 and 100%
Returns:
returns FALSE if quality value is not possible, TRUE else
